inclusion.criterion: Newly diagnosed biopsy proven breast cancer
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Sufficient tumor tissue from the diagnostic core biopsy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Tumor must be greater than 1 centimeter
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No prior treatment for breast cancer in the affected breast
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Women of childbearing potential are required to use an effective method of contraception
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Known positive HIV status or on medications for HIV
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient is a 42 year-old postmenopausal woman with newly diagnosed breast cancer. She has no prior treatment and meets the Karnofsky performance status criteria.
